author: sussman
msg: Followup to bdb-verbose-errors (r10557):  docstring and casting touchups.

author: sussman
msg: Note that this is *not* the complete list of changes between RC1 and
RC2.  That detailed list will be given in the RC2 release announcement.
Most of those changes are too "low-level" to be mentioned here, or are
bugfixes to new features already listed in the 1.1.0 CHANGES entry.

author: jaa
msg: Make REVPREFIX to conform current subject pattern of svn-breakage by default.

author: jaa
msg: The svntest framework won't run tests if there aren't any changes to test.
This commit will change the meaning of data in rebuild flag file, it is now
Abort testing if all rebuild flags are zero and
the rebuild sequence of projects is in correct order.
(UPDATE_REBUILD_FLAG): New parameter 'mode', this func. could now
check rebuild status for SVN projects too.
Added updating of SVN's rebuild flag.
(NEXT_PROJ, PREV_PROJ) Renamed, and changed the meaning of the second
argument, it is now the name of previous project.

author: maxb
msg: * STATUS (r10561): Nominate, and add votes from IRC.
